security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown guidance. No executable code, network calls, file system access, or environment variable reads. This is a safe instructional document for meeting preparation workflows.

content.user_title: Prepare smarter meeting agendas with Notion
content.value_statement: Meeting preparation takes too long when context is scattered. This skill pulls relevant Notion pages, selects the right template, and drafts agendas in minutes. Add Codex research to enrich materials with industry insights.
actual_capabilities: Gather meeting context from Notion pages using search and fetch tools
Select appropriate meeting templates (status, decision, planning, retro, 1:1, brainstorming)
Draft professional agendas with owners, timeboxes, and source links
Enrich agendas with Codex research for industry insights and benchmarks
Create and update Notion pages with prepared materials
Track blockers, risks, and open questions upfront
limitations: Requires active Notion MCP connection for full functionality
Does not schedule meetings or send calendar invites directly
Templates and examples are guidance only and require customization
Cannot access meeting attendee calendars or availability

use_cases.title: Sprint planning sessions
use_cases.description: Gather specs, past notes, and OKRs from Notion to build sprint plans with clear owners and timeboxes.

use_cases.title: Decision meetings
use_cases.description: Prepare decision documents by pulling relevant context and adding risk assessments from Codex research.

use_cases.title: Executive reviews
use_cases.description: Create executive pre-reads with synthesized context and industry benchmarks for informed decision-making.

prompt_templates.title: Basic meeting prep
prompt_templates.prompt: Use Meeting Intelligence to prepare a [type: status/decision/planning/retro/1:1/brainstorming] meeting for [date/time]. The goal is [objective]. Attendees include [list]. Search Notion for [relevant keywords] and draft an agenda with timeboxes.

prompt_templates.title: Research-enriched prep
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare a customer or partner meeting using Meeting Intelligence. Include Codex research on [industry/company]. Search Notion for [project context] and create a pre-read document with key background.

prompt_templates.title: Retrospective template
prompt_templates.prompt: Use Meeting Intelligence to prepare a retrospective. Pull action items and metrics from Notion for [sprint/project name]. Include a template for what went well, what did not, and action items.

prompt_templates.title: 1:1 preparation
prompt_templates.prompt: Prepare a 1:1 meeting agenda using Meeting Intelligence. Search Notion for the team member's goals, ongoing projects, and past feedback. Include career development discussion prompts.

output_examples.input: Prepare a sprint planning meeting for our mobile app team. Goal: plan next 2-week sprint. Attendees: 6 developers, 1 designer. Search Notion for the mobile roadmap and current backlog.

best_practices: Always search Notion first to gather relevant context before drafting agendas
Assign clear owners and timeboxes to each agenda item to keep meetings focused
Add research from Codex to provide evidence-based insights for decisions
anti_patterns: Creating agendas without checking Notion for existing context or past decisions
Skipping timeboxes and owners, leading to unfocused meetings
Using a single template for all meeting types instead of matching format to purpose

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Requires Notion MCP connection for full functionality.

faq.question: What meeting templates are available?
faq.answer: Status updates, decision meetings, sprint planning, retrospectives, 1:1s, and brainstorming sessions.

faq.question: Do I need a Notion API key?
faq.answer: Yes. Configure Notion MCP using codex mcp add notion --url https://mcp.notion.com/mcp

faq.question: Is my Notion data sent anywhere?
faq.answer: No. The skill uses your authenticated Notion connection directly. Your data stays within your authorized access.

faq.question: What if the Notion MCP is not connected?
faq.answer: The skill will pause and provide setup instructions. Follow the login workflow then restart your AI tool.

faq.question: How is this different from a general meeting scheduler?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on content preparation, not scheduling. It helps you build agendas, gather context, and research to make meetings more productive.
